activities: Client,candidate and staff information is stored on a central database at our global headquarters in the UK. US client, candidate and staff data is segregated but accessible by HQ corporate staff and info is exchange between countries. Candidates from EU/Switzerland will submit their Resumes directly to us in the US and some global companies will provide us with vacancies in the US, Canada and South America which may be co-ordinated from an office outside of teh US.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client contacts are added to our database by our own staff following a conversation with the opportunity to unsubscribe if they wish. All candidate information is submitted directly to our staff or via our website by candidates looking to change career.
privacyprograms: None that we are aware of.
recoursemech: In the unlikely event that we are unable to resolve any issues we would be willing to cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland.
